title: Profile Highlights Idea
body:
So, I've been playing on the PBE for a fair bit recently, and so far I am really enjoying the current updates and everything. But i noticed they no longer display ranks and now display only the level of the summoner whilst hovering the account in your friends list. I thought that Riot should still somehow incorporate the rank displayed on the account and possibly even honor level and what not... Here's a small edit I made to display both. I also had another idea shown below that could even display their most played champion/main champion on their account.

_**Profile Highlights #1 - No Champion Main Highlight**_
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0H3YChL2-8YU1NMZ1ZBWTE0MkU/view?usp=sharing

**_Profile Highlights #2 - Champion Main Highlight_**
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0H3YChL2-8YRXVCR2J4UnBFUG8/view?usp=sharing

These are not accurate to the current account, but it is all for the creative features and main ideas of the highlights for an account.

replies.body: I like the first one, but the second one seems a bit much. Also maybe submit this on the PBE boards?
